On 24 November we will organise an in-person open day for anyone interested in applying to the CCMI.
The event will take place 24 November from 3:30-5:30 pm at UCL Bidborough House. There will be presentations by our staff and
students and a reception where you have the chance to talk to supervisors and students in person.

To attend please sign up at:

https://www.eventbrite.com/e/collaborative-computational-modelling-at-the-interface-ccmi-cdt-open-day-tickets-1968015024917?aff=oddtdtcreator
